smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function validateUrl appears to be too complex.
The function onSave appears to be too complex.
The function onLoadFinished appears to be too complex.
The function loadInBackground appears to be too complex.
The function processEvents appears to be too complex.
The function processEvents appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onSave is nested too deeply.
Function onLoadFinished is nested too deeply.
Function onLoadFinished is nested too deeply.
Function loadInBackground is nested too deeply.
Function processEvents is nested too deeply.
Function processEvents is nested too deeply.
Function retainByUID is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'EditCalendarActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'CalendarListActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to NotificationManager.
parent.getItemAtPosition(position) cannot be safely cast to LocalCalendar.
getSystemService(Context.POWER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to PowerManager.
args?.getSerializable(ARG_INFO) cannot be safely cast to ResourceInfo.
arguments!!.getSerializable(ARG_INFO) cannot be safely cast to ResourceInfo.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
at.bitfire.icsdroid.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
androidx.work.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (credentials.username != null && credentials.password != null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: credentials.username != null && credentials.password != null
Parentheses in (!it.username.isNullOrEmpty() && !it.password.isNullOrEmpty()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !it.username.isNullOrEmpty() && !it.password.isNullOrEmpty()

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class ResourceInfo implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
